required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Compare Fallopian Tube Cells Collected by Cytuity With Removed Ovarian/Tubal Tissue to Determine Presence of Malignancy
clinical_study.official_title: The nCYT Study: A Powered Study to Evaluate the Sensitivity and Specificity of Cytological Evaluation of Fallopian Tube Samples Collected by the Cytuity in Determining the Presence of Malignancy

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective, multi-center, non-randomized study to assess the ability of the Cytuity device to collect cell samples from the fallopian tube that can be evaluated for the presence or absence of malignancy.

primary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity and Specificity of Cytological Samples for Fallopian Tube Involvement
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the cytological samples collected from the fallopian tube in determining the presence or absence of malignancy for fallopian tube involvement as compared to the surgical histology results. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.

secondary_outcome.measure: PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Fallopian Tube Involvement
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
secondary_outcome.description: Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries and fallopian tube for fallopian tube involvement. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Fallopian Tube
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the fallopian tube.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Ovaries
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries for epithelial malignancies.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Subject Level Analysis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology for fallopian tube involvement at the subject level. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.

intervention.intervention_name: Hysteroscopic cell sampling of the fallopian tube

study_pop.textblock: Subjects who are scheduled to undergo a salpingo-oophorectomy or salpingectomy because of a pelvic mass suspicious for malignancy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Subject is medically cleared for surgery
2. Subject is scheduled to undergo salpingo-oophorectomy or salpingectomy for a pelvic mass suspicious for malignancy
3. Subject must be 18 years of age
4. Subject must be able to provide informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Contraindication to hysteroscopy
2. Acute pelvic inflammatory disease
3. Active or recent lower pelvic infection
4. Pregnancy
5. Delivery or termination of a pregnancy in the past 6 weeks
6. Known tubal obstruction
7. Tubal ligation
8. Invasive carcinoma of the cervix or endometrium
9. Intolerance of anesthesia

facility.name: Kaiser Permanente San Francisco Medical Center

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

group.title: Cytuity Cytological Evaluation
group.description: Those subjects enrolled in the study, with hysteroscope placed, ostia visualized, and adequate Cytuity cell sample collected.

drop_withdraw_reason.title: Hysteroscope attempted but unable to find ostia

group.title: Cytuity Cytological Evaluation
group.description: Subjects from whom a signed informed consent form was obtained.

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Sensitivity and Specificity of Cytological Samples for Fallopian Tube Involvement
outcome.description: Evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the cytological samples collected from the fallopian tube in determining the presence or absence of malignancy for fallopian tube involvement as compared to the surgical histology results. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.
outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
outcome.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

group.title: Sensitivity - Proportion of Cytuity Cell Samples That Correctly Identify the Presence of Disease
group.description: The number of true positive Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of true positives and the number of false negatives.

group.title: Specificity - Proportion of Cytuity Cell Samples That Correctly Identify the Absence of Disease
group.description: The number of true negative Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of true negatives and the number of false positives.

measure.title: Sensitivity and Specificity of Cytological Samples for Fallopian Tube Involvement
measure.description: Evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the cytological samples collected from the fallopian tube in determining the presence or absence of malignancy for fallopian tube involvement as compared to the surgical histology results. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.
measure.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

outcome.title: PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Fallopian Tube Involvement
outcome.description: Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries and fallopian tube for fallopian tube involvement. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.
outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
outcome.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

group.title: PPV - Proportion of True Positive Results for Fallopian Tube Involvement
group.description: The proportion of positive Cytuity cell samples that came from a fallopian tube found to have histology positive for malignancy and/or a corresponding ovary found to have histology positive for malignancy

group.title: NPV - Proportion of True Negative Results for Fallopian Tube Involvement
group.description: The proportion of negative Cytuity cell samples that came from a fallopian tube found to have histology negative for malignancy and a corresponding ovary found to have histology negative for malignancy

group.title: Diagnostic Accuracy - Proportion of Accurate Diagnoses
group.description: The proportion of Cytuity cell sample results that conformed to the correct diagnosis as determined by the surgical histology results

measure.title: PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Fallopian Tube Involvement
measure.description: Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries and fallopian tube for fallopian tube involvement. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.
measure.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

outcome.title: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Fallopian Tube
outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the fallopian tube.
outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
outcome.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

group.title: Sensitivity - Proportion of Cytuity Cell Samples That Correctly Identify the Presence of Disease
group.description: The number of true positive Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of true positive and the number of false negatives

group.title: Specificity - Proportion of Cytuity Cell Samples That Correctly Identify the Absence of Disease
group.description: The number of true negative Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of true negatives and the number of false positives

group.title: PPV - Proportion of True Positive Results for Fallopian Tube Pathology
group.description: The proportion of positive Cytuity cell samples that came from a fallopian tube also found to have histology positive for malignancy

group.title: NPV - Proportion of True Negative Results for Fallopian Tube Pathology
group.description: The proportion of negative Cytuity cell samples that came from a fallopian tube also found to have histology negative for malignancy

group.title: Diagnostic Accuracy - Proportion of Accurate Diagnoses
group.description: The proportion of Cytuity cell sample results that conformed to the correct diagnosis as determined by the surgical histology results

measure.title: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Fallopian Tube
measure.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the fallopian tube.
measure.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

outcome.title: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Ovaries
outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries for epithelial malignancies.
outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy
outcome.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

group.title: Sensitivity - Proportion of Cytuity Cell Samples That Correctly Identify the Presence of Disease
group.description: Number of true positive Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of true positives and the number of false negatives

group.title: Specificity - Proportion of Cytuity Cell Samples That Correctly Identify the Absence of Disease
group.description: The number of true negative Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of true negatives and the number of false positives

group.title: PPV - Proportion of True Positive Results for Ovary Pathology for Epithelial Malignancy
group.description: The proportion of positive Cytuity cell samples that came from a fallopian tube adjacent to a corresponding ovary found to have histology positive for malignancy

group.title: NPV - Proportion of True Negatives for Ovary Pathology for Epithelial Malignancy
group.description: The proportion of negative Cytuity cell samples that came from a fallopian tube adjacent to a corresponding ovary found to have histology truly negative for malignancy

group.title: Diagnostic Accuracy - Proportion of Accurate Diagnoses
group.description: The proportion of Cytuity cell sample results that conformed to the correct diagnosis as determined by the surgical histology results

measure.title: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy of the Ovaries
measure.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology of the ovaries for epithelial malignancies.
measure.population: The number of Cytuity cell samples, not participants, was used for these endpoint analyses.

outcome.title: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Subject Level Analysis
outcome.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology for fallopian tube involvement at the subject level. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.
outcome.time_frame: At the time of the scheduled salpingectomy or salpingo-oophorectomy

group.title: Sensitivity - Subjects in Which the Cytuity Correctly Identified the Presence of Disease
group.description: Number of subjects with true positive Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of subjects with true positives and the number of subjects with false negatives

group.title: Specificity - Subjects in Which the Cytuity Correctly Identified the Absence of Disease
group.description: The number of subjects with true negative Cytuity cell samples divided by the number of subjects with true negatives and the number of subjects with false positives

group.title: PPV - True Positive Results for Fallopian Tube Involvement on Subject Level
group.description: The number of subjects with a positive Cytuity cell sample and a fallopian tube and/or corresponding ovary with histology positive for malignancy

group.title: NPV - True Negative Results for Fallopian Tube Involvement on Subject Level
group.description: The number of subjects with a negative Cytuity cell sample and a fallopian tube and corresponding ovary with histology negative for malignancy

group.title: Diagnostic Accuracy - Subjects With Accurate Diagnoses
group.description: The number of subjects with a Cytuity cell sample result that conformed to the correct diagnosis on a subject level as determined by the surgical histology results

measure.title: Sensitivity, Specificity, PPV, NPV and Diagnostic Accuracy for Subject Level Analysis
measure.description: Sensitivity, Specificity, Positive Predictive Value, Negative Predictive Value and Diagnostic Accuracy will be calculated for Cytuity as compared to surgical histology for fallopian tube involvement at the subject level. Fallopian tube involvement was defined as: 1. Malignant cells that originated in the fallopian tube, detected by the surgical histology results from the fallopian tube. 2. Malignant cells that have migrated to the fallopian tube, detected by surgical histology results of the ovaries or fallopian tube.

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse events occurring from the time the hysteroscope entered the subject until study exit (defined as 24 hours post-Cytuity use or discharge, whichever occurs first).

group.title: Treated Subjects
group.description: Subjects who signed the informed consent and had hysteroscope placement attempted

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
